div.head: 蝮蛇傷
div.div: harm caused by a pallas pit viper

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by a pallas pit viper

sense.def: Pathological Condition of she hui du 蛇虺毒② , venomous snake poisoning, resulting from a pallas pit viper bite. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai zhi 白芷：夷堅志所載治蝮蛇傷之方，亦制 以所畏也，而本草不曾言及 , “The recipes listed in the Yi jian zhi 夷堅志 for curing harm caused by a pallas pit viper also seek to overpower [such harm] by using items that are feared [by a pallas pit viper]. They have not been mentioned in ben cao [literature]”.
